objects.text:
• Premium Quality Fabric
• Latest Trendsetting Designs
• Unmatched Comfort & Fit

banner_details:
This banner presents a modern and fashionable promotional design aimed at highlighting a new apparel arrival. It is split vertically, with a clean white section on the left and a light peach background on the right, separated by a soft curved design. At the top-left, the text layers `"heading_1"` and `"heading_2"` declare the campaign with bold, uppercase typography for a strong visual impact. The `"subheading"` text underneath gives a brief yet stylish description of the offering. Below that, layer `"description"` lists key product features in bullet points. The `"price"` stands out in bright red, adding urgency. A prominent black rectangular button (`"cta_background"`) with white uppercase text (`"cta"`) invites user action. On the right, `"product_image"` features two women showcasing trendy fashion, enhancing the lifestyle appeal. The design is enriched with floating geometric shapes and subtle patterns, adding a playful yet cohesive aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Soft Peach (#FFF9F0)
- Pale Blush (#FFDAC1)
- Coral Red (#E53935)
- Charcoal Gray (#3A3A3A)
- Light Blue (#ADD8E6)
- Light Yellow (#FFEB99)
- Seafoam Green (#B2DFDB)
- Light Pink (#FFC0CB)
product_color: The image features two young women taking a selfie, suggesting a fun, youthful, and social theme suitable for advertising tech or lifestyle products. The dominant color palette includes deep navy blue (#003366) from the denim shirt, soft teal gray (#9BA5A0) from the inner shirt, natural light skin tones (#FAD6C4), and rich brunette-brown hair shades (#4B3621). Accents include a clean white (#FFFFFF) background and a subtle silver-gray (#BDC3C7) from the smartphone. These colors are carefully blended to maintain contrast yet harmony—highlighting the product and faces. Overall, the palette is modern and vibrant, appealing to a youthful, trendy audience.
